div.p: YES, A TEST OF A NEW
WHAT WILL THEY DO TO US?
I WOULD IF I COULD, SIR,
WOULD THEY NOT HAVE USED IT
AND I SWORE ON HIS GRAVE
THERE ARE RULES, EVEN IN WAR.
AT A MAN AFTER HE'S DOWN.
THERE'S NO USE TRYING TO FREE
AND TRY TO MAKE IT BACK
IT IS AN ALIEN LIFE FORCE,
THERE IS AN ALIEN ON BOARD
MAY I SAY THAT I HAVE
I, TOO, FELT A BRIEF SURGE
MAYBE WE CAN PROVE TO YOU
WE'VE GOT TO GET RID OF IT.
AND GET RID OF THIS THING.
THAT NONE OF US WILL BE
IF I COULD TALK TO KANG...
I KNOW YOU CAN HEAR ME,
I WILL TAKE YOU TO KANG.
ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND?
I SEE WHY THE HUMAN BEAST
AND IT GOES ON AND ON,
BE A PAWN, BE A TOY,
